text: Allaha taâ€™ala jibanopakarane tomadera ekajanake an'yajanera ca'ite srestatba diyechena. Ata'eba yaderake sresthatba deya hayeche, tara tadera adhinastha dasa-dasiderake sbiya jibika theke emana kichu deya na, yate tara e bisaye tadera samana haye yabe. Tabe ki tara allahara neyamata asbikara kare.
